articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Lao Ambassador 
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Meets Syrian Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Meets Syrian Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with a delegation of the General Union of Syrian Peasants led by Chairman Hammad Abboud Al Saud which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from General Union of Syrian Peasants
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from General Union of Syrian Peasants
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the General Union of Syrian Peasants.
					 Chairman of the union Hammad Abboud Al Saud who is heading the visiting delegation of the union handed the gift over to Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Thursday.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Assailed 
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea on Thursday made public a statement accusing the south Korean puppet group of kicking up a frantic anti-DPRK racket. 
					 The south Korean puppet authorities let subsidized institutes and anti-DPRK "human rights" bodies made up of riff-raffs spout a litany of  such invectives as painting those workers sent by the DPRK to different countries for external economic cooperation as "ones engaged in slave labor" and "subject to exploitation." 
					
					 They, at the same time, brought the "human rights" issue of workers of the DPRK overseas for discussion at the meeting with the U.S. and Japanese delegates to the six-party talks held in Seoul late in May though it had nothing to do with the nuclear issue and agreed to use the matter as a "new subject for pressing the north." They are making desperate efforts to achieve their sinister aim by instigating the U.S. and other hostile forces and international bodies. 
					
					 The statement branded the racket as an unpardonable challenge to defame the dignity and image of the DPRK and intolerable insult to the overseas workers devoting themselves to the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for Park Geun Hye, descendant of the notorious "yusin" dictator, and her group to vociferate about the human rights of the overseas workers of the DPRK, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 Their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is nothing but the desperate efforts of those who are much upset by the DPRK making a dynamic advance, powerfully demonstrating its might before the whole world as a matchless military power and nuclear power for self-defence. 
					
					 All the workers of the DPRK will surely smash the sinister anti-DPRK "human rights" racket of the south Korean puppet group, hordes of rare traitors.

articles.title: Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Monument to Three Charters for National Reunification
articles.content:
Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Monument to Three Charters for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), and its staff members visited the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification on Thursday on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 They went round the tower and group of subsidiary theme sculptures, being briefed on the fact that the monument was successfully built, reflecting the will of the nation to convey to posterity the feats performed by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu in accomplishing the cause of national reunification and usher in a new era of independent reunification under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Jo Il Min said that the immortal exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed by providing the June 15 joint declaration, a programme for reunification, to be held high by the Korean nation invariably, would go down in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 The cause of national reunification is sure to be achieved as there is the great programme for reunification common to the nation and Marshal Kim Jong Un, peerless patriot and great brilliant commander of Songun, is wisely leading the struggle for national reunification.

articles.title: National Day of Russia Observed
articles.content:
National Day of Russia Observed
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception on Thursday on the occasion of the national day of Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kung Sok Ung, vice-foreign minister, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, Hong So Hon, president of Kim Chaek University of Technology who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Parliamentary Group, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Alexandr Matsegora said in his speech that Russia has the willingness to boost traditional and friendly relations with the DPRK. 
					
					 An opening ceremony of the year of the Russia-DPRK friendship took place in Moscow in April this year with splendor, he noted, referring to the cooperative relations between the two countries which are developing onto a higher stage.
					
					 He wished the friendly Korean people new successes in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Ro Tu Chol referred to the achievements made by the Russian people in their work for regaining the mightiness and dignity of the country despite the sudden changes in the domestic politics, economic life and international relations.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The bilateral relations have unprecedentedly made dynamic progress as evidenced by the exchange of high-level visits and undertaking of profitable and mutually beneficial cooperation projects in various fields between the two countries this year, the year of DPRK-Russia friendship.
					
					 Recalling that Marshal Kim Jong Un is paying deep attention to developing the relations with Russia, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, Ro added that it is the consistent stand of the DPRK government to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 On the same day the Russian consulate general in Chongjin gave a reception.

articles.title: National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held
articles.content:
National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held 
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was held at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday.
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier, officials of party, administration and working people's organizations, those of science, education, literature and art, media, institutions for training party cadres and those in the field of the preservation of revolutionary relics.
					
					 The participants heard five papers that explained and proved the validity and vitality of the ideas and theories Kim Jong Il advanced in the work on June 19, Juche 84 (1995).
					
					 Ri Yong Sik, editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, said the work was an immortal library which perfectly clarified the importance, basic mission and contents of the ideological work in accomplishing the socialist cause and theories on its principles and methods.
					
					 Kim Thae Hi, chief secretary of the party committee of Kim Il Sung University, noted the socialist ideology is a main engine which makes it possible to fully demonstrate the invincible might in all fabrics of society and victoriously advance it and that socialism is a society which develops by dint of purposeful and conscious struggle of the popular masses equipped with the socialist ideology.
					
					 Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, proved the reason why modeling the whole society on the monolithic idea has become a basic mission of the ideological work under socialism.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, director and editor-in-chief of the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House, noted that the party's leadership is vital to the ideological work under socialism.
					
					 Kim Ryong Sik, secretary of the primary party committee of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, said it is the firm will of Marshal Kim Jong Un to hold fast to the Juche-oriented theory of idea as a powerful means for the final victory.

articles.title: DPRK Is Only Power of Youth in World: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Is Only Power of Youth in World: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, inspecting the construction site of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station in April last, highly praised the young builders there for their heroic feats, saying the DPRK is the power of youth.
					 The birth of a new historical term the power of youth is a historic event that brought about a radical turn in humankind's view on power, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 By setting forth the idea on the power of youth for the first time in history, the Workers' Party of Korea clarified the important goal of struggle and principled issues in building a power and consolidating its status.
					
					 The building of the power of youth means, in essence, a drive for training reliable builders of a prosperous country and pillars of the country's future. A military power and an economic power can be successfully built and their dignity and might can be glorified for all ages only when their building is simultaneously pushed forward along with the building of the power of youth. This is a Juche-based viewpoint on the building of a power. This was clearly proved by the lesson drawn from the countries, which had once been famous as world-class powers, lost their status, having their glorious days recorded only in history books.
					
					 It is only the DPRK which has set an epoch-making example in settling the issue of youth, the first of its kind in history, and built a power of youth both in name and reality. The building of the Juche-based power of youth, along with the invincible political and ideological power and military power, is the most precious success made by the party and the people of the DPRK in the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The DPRK is, indeed, the greatest power in history.
					
					 The successful building of the power of youth provided a sure guarantee for further consolidating the country's status as a political and ideological power and military power and dynamically stepping up the overall construction of a highly civilized socialist economic power in reliance on the powerful drive force. 
					
					 The article calls on the young people to straightly and dynamically advance toward a final victory, holding aloft the torch of the revolution as befitting the masters of the power of youth under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges Japanese Reactionaries to Immediately Release Officials of Chongryon
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges Japanese Reactionaries to Immediately Release Officials of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese police authorities staged the farce of bringing to a court the case of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) arrested on charges of the "Oriental Co. Ltd.'s violation of the law on foreign exchange."
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday says the Japanese reactionaries' action was an ill-intended politically-motivated campaign against Chongryon.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The recently indicted officials of Chongryon had nothing to do with the case of the Oriental Co. Ltd. and they had never imported even 0.001 gram of Korean songi mushroom.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' action taken against the officials of Chongryon is a vicious smear campaign against Chongryon and the DPRK to tarnish their image in the world arena.
					
					 It is a trite method of the Japanese reactionaries to seek a way out in intensifying their smear campaign against the DPRK and Chongryon, prompted by their political ambition. 
					
					 There is the question as to why they are getting so desperate in their moves to crack down on Chongryon these days.
					
					 Taking advantages of the situation where the revision of the "Japan-U.S. Defence Cooperation Guidelines" has paved a broad avenue to overseas invasion, the Japanese reactionaries are now seeking to turn Japan into a military giant and, at the same time, working hard to stamp out Chongryon and realize their ambition for reinvasion, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should immediately halt their vicious political crackdown and human rights abuses against Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan, release the unreasonably arrested officials of Chongryon and stop their rash actions.

articles.title: Actions Staged against U.S. Moves for Bio-chemical Warfare
articles.content:
Actions Staged against U.S. Moves for Bio-chemical Warfare
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The June 15 group of students of the Seoul preparatory committee for the joint national event staged a demonstration on June 6 to denounce the U.S. introduction of anthrax germs along the street leading to the U.S. forces base in Ryongsan.
					 In front of the base demonstrators demanded the U.S. properly clarify the nature of "Jupiter plan" being undertaken under the pretext of coping with "bio-chemical warfare" at U.S. forces bases in south Korea.
					
					 At the end of the demo, members of the group held a rally around the Kwanghwamun demanding an immediate revision of the SOFA.
					
					 Nearly 70 organizations of various circles such as organizations of workers, farmers, women, the poor, religionists and students held a joint press conference before the command of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea on June 8 in protest against the U.S. moves for a biochemical warfare.
					
					 The organizations demanded the U.S. totally cancel the plan and dismantle weapons for the biochemical warfare and apologize for its crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Court's Decision Requires Regime to Pay Reparation to Bereaved of Those Involved in Conspiratorial Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Court's Decision Requires Regime to Pay Reparation to Bereaved of Those Involved in Conspiratorial Case 
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court of south Korea made a judgment urging the regime to pay reparation to the bereaved families of those involved in the case of Minjok Ilbo cooked up by the erstwhile Park Chung Hee military fascist dictatorial junta, according to south Korean Yonhap News on June 7.
					 The Park fascist junta, which seized power through the May 16 military coup, arrested without a warrant and jailed in 1961 the core members of Minjok Ilbo, a progressive paper at that time, including its manager and chief editor, on charges that "the paper carried articles and editorials sympathizing with the activities of the north." 
					
					 By invoking the "special law on punishing special crimes" cooked up by themselves, the military gangsters sentenced the manager, inspector and manager of tele-communication office of the paper to death, 6 others to 5 to 10 years in prison on October 31 of the same year.
					
					 The Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation in 2006 termed the case a human rights abuse and decided on probing the truth behind it.
					
					 Under the strong pressure of the bereaved families, a verdict of not guilty was given to the victims of the case.

articles.title: U.S. Scenario for Germ Warfare under Fire by S. Korean Newspaper
articles.content:
U.S. Scenario for Germ Warfare under Fire by S. Korean Newspaper
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People Wednesday in an editorial accused the U.S. of its monstrous scenario for germ warfare.
					 The editorial said that the U.S. introduction of anthrax germs into south Korea strongly shocked the south Korean society because it had already waged germ warfare during the Korean War.
					
					 It referred to the fact that the original copy of a report on the germ warfare waged by the U.S. during the Korean War was made public.
					
					 It said that the report was so concrete in its contents that U.S. could not deny it.
					
					 The editorial urged the U.S. to clarify the truth behind the germ warfare during the Korean War.

articles.title: Korean Youth Organization in China Calls for Struggle for National Reunification
articles.content:
Korean Youth Organization in China Calls for Struggle for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China in a statement on June 9 said the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula shows that the Korean nation can never escape from the danger of a war as long as the pro-U.S. reactionary and conservative regime denying the June 15 joint declaration and persisting in the confrontation with the fellow countrymen and dependence on outside forces exists in south Korea.
					 Only when all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas implement the June 15 joint declaration, united closer, is it possible to create genuine atmosphere of dialogue, cooperation and reconciliation and pave the way for reunification, it noted.
					
					 The Korean youth in China will wage a more dynamic struggle to achieve the reunification of the country as early as possible, united close under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russian Personages
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- An event took place in Russia to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Round-table talks were held by the Maritime Territorial Branch and the Nakhodka City Branch of the Maritime Territory of the United Russia Party and a seminar by the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on June 2 and June 3.
					
					 A vice-secretary of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russia Party praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding politician who developed the WPK into the most revolutionary and militant party and into a popular one and led the struggle of progressive mankind for independence and justice to victory.
					
					 The secretary of the Regional Political Council of the Nakhodka City Branch of the Maritime Territory of the United Russia Party said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il is powerfully demonstrating its invincible might under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The editor-in-chief of the organ of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Political Figures of Ghana, Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Political Figures of Ghana, Egypt
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Political figures of Egypt and Ghana released statements on June 1 and 4 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, said that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK firmly defended the cause of socialism, effecting miracles and innovations in all fields including politics, military affairs and economy and it serves as a beacon indicating the way to be followed by the progressive political parties of the world.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said:
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Il's history of the leadership over the party which recorded a brilliant chapter in the 70 year-long history of the WPK is a proud one of a great man who made the DPRK a focus of the world.
					
					 The great exploits performed by him in the period of leading the WPK will always be remembered by mankind along with his august name.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded in Foreign Country
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded in Foreign Country
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will always emerge victorious under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union said this in a statement on June 4.
					
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il further developed the party into the general staff of the revolution and into the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people for five decades since he started work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Under his leadership the WPK became an invincible party most transparent in the principles of socialism and set an example to be followed by all progressive political parties of the world.
					
					 The exploits performed by Kim Jong Il, the eternal general secretary of the WPK, in party-building will last forever.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A Russian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea was formed on June 5 under the sponsorship of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					 Chairman of the association V. A. Petrov was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the anniversaries.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Mexico
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A Mexican national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed at the building of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico on June 5.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee discussed the issues of widely introducing the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un and organizing diverse political and cultural events such as meeting, lecture and seminar till October 10 and adopted a relevant decision.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on June 4 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The publication of the joint declaration is specially recorded in the history of the movement for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The keynote of the joint declaration which reflects the three charters for national reunification set forth by President Kim Il Sung is to reject interference by foreign forces and solve the reunification issue by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 The joint declaration is the most aboveboard and reasonable banner for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the pro-U.S. conservative forces of south Korea were not pleased with the June 15 era of reunification which was ushered in the Korean peninsula after the publication of the joint declaration.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea totally negated the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, chief executive of south Korea, is crying out for "unification under liberal democracy" by following in the footsteps of Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 Korea should be reunified under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration, the statement stressed.

articles.title: KFA Supports DPRK's Peaceful Space Development
articles.content:
KFA Supports DPRK's Peaceful Space Development
						
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association (KFA) headquartered in Spain made public a statement on June 4 in support of the DPRK's peaceful space development.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's peaceful space development and satellite manufacture and launch.
					
					 The DPRK has a legitimate right to develop space.
					
					 The space is not monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. and forces following it should stop at once their moves against the DPRK.
					
					 No one can break the will of the DPRK to develop space.
					
					 It will launch more satellites to develop the national economy and boost its defense capability.

articles.title: British Organizations Support DPRK's Independent Right to Space Development
articles.content:
British Organizations Support DPRK's Independent Right to Space Development
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on June 3 in support of the DPRK's space development for peaceful purposes.
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers pulled up the DPRK over its newly-built Satellite Control Centre of the National Aerospace Development Administration, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 Satellite launch is the exercise of a legitimate right of all countries.
					
					 It is clear what the U.S. imperialists and their followers seek by accusing the DPRK of developing space for peaceful purposes, its independent right.
					
					 We send full support to the satellite launches which will demonstrate the might of socialist Korea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador laosiano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador laosiano
						
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- Phonekham Inthaboualy presento este jueves en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao en la RPDC. 
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: FGSC condena campana intrigante de DDHH anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
FGSC condena campana intrigante de DDHH anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) publico el dia 11 una declaracion de condena a la farsa intrigante anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de la banda titere del Sur de Corea como sigue:
					En estos dias la horda titere del Sur de Corea instiga los organos de investigacion venales y otras entidades intrigantes de "DDHH" anti-RPDC a soltar los disparates muy provocativos tales como "trabajo de esclavos" y "explotacion" en relacion con que la RPDC desarrolla las actividades de cooperacion economica con el extranjero al enviar a los trabajadores a ultramar.
					
					Ademas puso sobre la mesa de reunion con los representantes de las conversaciones a 6 bandas de Estados Unidos y Japon efectuada en Seul a finales de mayo el tema de "DDHH" de los trabajadores norcoreanos enviados al extranjero que no tiene nada que ver con el problema nuclear y acordo en usarlo como nuevo "asunto de presion al Norte".
					
					En tanto, hace esfuerzos desesperados para realizar su intencion malsana incitando hasta las organizaciones internacionales bajo el amparo de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Esto deviene el desafio imperdonable tendente a manchar la dignidad y la imagen de la RPDC y el insulto a los trabajadores que hacen abnegacion para la construccion de la patria prospera.
					
					Es el maximo cinismo el que Park Geun-hye, hija del dictador de "Yusin" (renovacion) de mala fama, y sus titeres picotean sobre los DDHH de los trabajadores norcoreanos.
					
					La campana intrigante de "DDHH" de la horda titere no pasa de ser los ultimos esfuerzos de los espantados por el impetu de la RPDC que exalta a todo el mundo su aspecto majestuoso como invicta potencia militar y potencia nuclear de autodefensa.
					
					Todos los obreros de la RPDC quebrantaran rotundamente las perversas maniobras intrigantes de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de la banda titere del Sur de Corea.

articles.title: Efectuado seminario sobre obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Efectuado seminario sobre obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el seminario central para estudiar y asimilar profundamente la justeza y la vitalidad de la idea y teoria presentadas en la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Priorizar la labor ideologica es requisito indispensable para el cumplimiento de la causa socialista".
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central de Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, funcionarios de las instituciones del Partido y la administracion y entidades de trabajadores en el centro y la capital y, trabajadores de sectores de la ciencia, la educacion, la literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, el organo de formacion de los funcionarios partidistas y de la rama de la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Fueron publicadas 5 tesis que explicaron y argumentaron a fondo la justeza y la vitalidad de la idea y teorias presentadas por el Dirigente en su obra publicada el 19 de junio del 84 (1995) de la Era Juche.
					
					El editor-jefe de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, Ri Yong Sik dijo que la obra es la coleccion que aclara perfectamente la teoria sobre la importancia, la mision fundamental, el contenido, el principio y el metodo de la labor ideologica en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista.
					
					El secretario jefe del Comite del Partido en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Kim Thae Hi menciono que la idea socialista es la fuerza motriz fundamental para manifestar plenamente el poderio invencible y avanzar exitosamente, en todos los sectores de la sociedad, y el socialismo es la sociedad que se desarrolla mediante la lucha consciente de las masas populares armadas con la idea socialista.
					
					La directora de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, Ri Hye Jong argumento la razon, segun la cual la identificacion ideologica de toda la sociedad constituye el deber principal de la labor ideologica del socialismo.
					
					El director y editor jefe de la Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Yong Chol dijo que la direccion del Partido es la linea de vida de la labor ideologica del socialismo.
					
					El secretario de base del Partido en la Escuela Superior del Partido Kim Il Sung, Kim Ryong Sik subrayo que tomar la ideologia del Juche como arma potente de la victoria final es la voluntad firme del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
